nodes.documentation:
@notice This interface defines the functions to manage the Escrow contracts associated to borrowers and loans.
@author develop@teller.finance
nodes.name: EscrowFactoryInterface
isDapp
createEscrow

nodes.documentation:
@notice It adds a new dapp to the factory.
@param dapp address to add in this factory.
nodes.name: addDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice It removes a current dapp from the factory.
@param dapp address to remove.
nodes.name: removeDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets all the dapps in the factory.
@return an array of dapps (addresses).
nodes.name: getDapps

nodes.documentation:
@notice It initializes this escrow contract factory instance.
@param settingsAddress the settings contract address.
nodes.name: initialize
EscrowCreated
NewDAppAdded
DAppRemoved

nodes.documentation:
@notice This interface defines the functions to manage the Escrow contracts associated to borrowers and loans.
@author develop@teller.finance
nodes.name: EscrowFactoryInterface
isDapp
createEscrow

nodes.documentation:
@notice It adds a new dapp to the factory.
@param dapp address to add in this factory.
nodes.name: addDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice It removes a current dapp from the factory.
@param dapp address to remove.
nodes.name: removeDapp

nodes.documentation:
@notice Gets all the dapps in the factory.
@return an array of dapps (addresses).
nodes.name: getDapps

nodes.documentation:
@notice It initializes this escrow contract factory instance.
@param settingsAddress the settings contract address.
nodes.name: initialize
EscrowCreated
NewDAppAdded
DAppRemoved

params.dapp: address to add in this factory.

params.borrower: borrower address associated to the loan.
params.loanID: loan id to associate to the new escrow instance.

isDapp(address).return: true if the dapp address already exists. Otherwise it returns false.

addDapp(address).notice: It adds a new dapp to the factory.

createEscrow(address,uint256).notice: It creates an Escrow contract for a given loan id.

getDapps().notice: Gets all the dapps in the factory.

initialize(address).notice: It initializes this escrow contract factory instance.

isDapp(address).notice: It tests whether a dapp address exists in the factory or not.

removeDapp(address).notice: It removes a current dapp from the factory.

userdoc.notice: This interface defines the functions to manage the Escrow contracts associated to borrowers and loans.
